Course Access.name: Course Access
Course Access.description: The Course Access Brightspace Data Set returns information on each day each user has accessed each course offering from the LMS (via a browser) across the organization. The data set does not include course access via any of our Apps. The Course Access data set is limited to 3 years of data (all of the previous two calendar years and the current calendar year to date). Note: If an administrator changes your time zone at the organization level, this can affect the calculation of DayAccessed because this field is in local time.

columns.name: DayAccessed
columns.description: Indicates the most recent day in local time when a user accessed the course.
